statements: DELETE FROM fake_accounts WHERE account_name = 'JohnDoe' AND account_status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM fake_accounts WHERE account_name = 'Anonymous Account';
DELETE FROM propaganda_posts WHERE post_id = 100 AND is_propaganda = TRUE;
DELETE FROM fake_accounts WHERE username = 'fake_user' AND email = 'fake@domain.com';
DELETE FROM Investigations WHERE end_date IS NOT NULL AND outcome = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM comments WHERE commenter_id = 100 AND comment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM investigations WHERE post_id = (SELECT post_id FROM posts WHERE account_id = 200) AND reason = 'spam';
